DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to demonstrate the influence of peri-operative nutrition on the preservation of lean body mass after gastric bypass, as well as it's influence on postoperative complications.
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Nutrition in Gastric Bypass Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measures: - Lean body mass - Length of hospital stay - Weight loss - Postoperative complications - Cost
DOC.criteria: RYGBP surgery planned Age over 18 Informed consent Previous bariatric surgery
